channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I never questioned, 'Why me?'': Erika Kirk says 'God is good' months after husband's assassination
item.description: Charlie Kirk's widow says she has a simple explanation for people who still can't understand how she's able to forgive the man accused of killing her ...

item.title: The Cookies of Christmas Past and Present
item.description: My plan: to make ten recipes over the course of a week.

item.title: Mixed Vaccine Messages Threaten Trump’s Agenda and Republicans’ Electoral Outlook
item.description: Polls show that strong majorities of voters — including Trump supporters — think vaccines are forces for good.

item.title: France’s Populist Surge Is a Cautionary Tale for America’s Right
item.description: Populism can win elections, but without fiscal discipline, it risks perpetuating the very welfare bloat it rails against.

item.title: Bring Back Snow Days
item.description: A day of sledding, snowmen, and sleeping in offers more benefits than drawbacks.

item.title: Who Is the Radical?
item.description: Muslim jihadists’ actions are consistent with centuries-old sharia law.

item.title: Trump praises his crime crackdown and tariffs
item.description: President Trump touted his tariffs and crime rates as his first year back in office comes to a close.

item.title: Ladies, You’re Loading The Dishwasher All Wrong. Here’s How To Do It The Right Way
item.description: The Federalist is here with a step-by-step guide on how to properly load a dishwasher and end your kitchen nightmares once and for all.

item.title: The Best Classic Movies And T.V. To Watch With Your Family This Post-Christmas Week
item.description: Here is your ultimate guide to the best old-school films and T.V. series to enjoy in the days between Christmas and New Year's.

item.title: New York Legalizes Doctors Prescribing Death
item.description: New York Gov. Hochul announced last week that she will sign a bill legalizing medically assisted suicide for adults with a terminal illness.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence In The Classroom Destroys Actual Intelligence In Students
item.description: Students should aspire to be more than mere 'prompt writers,' but minds capable of thinking, reasoning, and perseverance.
